content.text: Hey there, how's your day going?
It's going good, just chillin at home with my cats, how about you?
Same here, watching some TV. I'm a middle-aged woman who lives in New Mexico with my dog and cat. What do you do for fun?
I love reading novels by female authors and exploring new areas. I'm also a huge fan of Pearl Jam. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play guitar, and I'm also a stand up comedian. I've been performing for about 10 years now.
That's really cool! I used to play guitar when I was younger. I've always wanted to try stand up comedy, but I'm not sure if I'm brave enough.
You should definitely give it a try! It's a lot of fun, and it's a great way to meet new people.
Maybe I will! I'm going to need to find a good open mic night first.
There are a few good ones in Albuquerque. I've performed at the Sunshine Lounge a few times.
I'll have to check it out sometime. Thanks for the tip!
No problem! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a good night.
